0.post_text:
Coca-Cola Singapore and CapitaLand Mall Asia are celebrating Christmas this year with life-size snowy Christmas displays made purely from upcycled bottles. 

These creative decorations are up on display at Raffles City Shopping Centre and Lot One Shoppers’ Mall this festive season so be sure to come down and check these innovative displays out!

From 5 – 25 December, you can also win attractive prizes when you guess the number of upcycled bottles used in the display below. 

Simply leave a comment with the hashtag #CocaColaRecyclingWonderland on this post and three winners with the closest guess can stand a chance to win Limited Edition Coca-Cola premiums made from recycled bottles and $20 CapitaVoucher!
#CocaColaSG #RafflesCity #LotOne

1.post_text:
Indulge in these thick and crispy Coin Prata dipped into a delicious sweet and savoury Chilli Crab sauce! Savour the juicy chunks of crab meat in the sauce, and balance the flavour and spiciness out with a refreshing can of ice-cold #Coke. 

#CocaColaSG #LocalfavouriteWithCoke #ChilliCrabPrataWithCoke

Warm your bellies with a hearty bowl of Teochew porridge, accompanied by your choice of side dishes and a glass of refreshing #Coke – definitely brings you back to the good old days of a tasty homemade meal! 

#CocaColaSG #LocalfavouriteWithCoke #TeochewPorridgeWithCoke

7.post_text:
Congratulations once more to the winners of our #LocalfavouriteWithCoke contest, and a big thank you to everyone who participated!

Although our contest has come to a close, do check out the delicious feasts that winners indulged in last weekend, and continue sharing with us your local favourite dishes to have over some refreshing ice-cold #Coke!

10.post_text:
Get your mentaiko fix with this Aburi Sushi roll – covered with salmon slices and flamed to a semi-cooked state for that melty, creamy texture! 

A popular ingredient originating from Japan, mentaiko is thick and creamy – perfect to pair with a can of fizzy and refreshing #Coke! Check out Ladyironchef’s take on this popular Asian cuisine.  

#LocalfavouriteWithCoke #cocacolasg #sp

17.post_text:
And…that’s the end of our campus invasions! Did you manage to grab a can of fizzy #Coke from our roving mobile truck? 

Thank you to everyone who dropped by, hope we managed to perk up your afternoon with the games, music and of course – some icy cold #Coke! 

Remember to tag us in your photos and hashtag #perkupWithCoke to share your moments with us!

18.post_text:
Thank you to all who participated in the final round of our #LocalfavouriteWithCoke contest! Here are the winning entries - don't they look absolutely mouth-watering?

Do continue to tag us in your meal moments, and share with us more local favourites that you love having with #Coke!

comments.message: And that concludes the final round of our #LocalfavouriteWithCoke contest! Once again, thank you to all who participated and shared your favourite dishes to have with #Coke! Congratulations to Serene Koh-Chew, #HaiDiLao is definitely a perfect match to have with some ice-cold Coke! Kindly PM us with your contact information so we can get in touch with you.

My favourite trending food of the year is #HaiDiLaoWithCoke! Coke is a perfect match with the mala "numb & spicy" feeling! Damn shiok! Burpppppp 😉
#LocalFavouriteWithCoke #Coke

Best weather for these ! This stall at a coffee shop serves msian herbal bkt and they also serve curry yong toufu apart from the thick braised sauce one. First time trying the curry yong toufu and it is quite spicy but I'm glad I have my fav drink of all time to go with this lunch ! #LocalFavouritewithCoke  #bakkuttehwithCoke
Amy Leong this is the one i mentioned! ma la xiang guo! 😍😍😍

19.post_text:
Thank you to all who participated in Round 2 of our #LocalfavouriteWithCoke contest, and congratulations to the winner! If you didn’t manage to catch the last two rounds, here’s your last chance to win a feast of up to $500 with 5 of your friends at Kok Sen Restaurant on 12 Nov '16!

Share your favourite local asian favourite that has taken Singapore by storm and hashtag your picture as such #<insertfood>WithCoke (e.g. #MaLaXiangGuoWithCoke)! Remember only entries via Facebook will be taken into consideration!

Comprising a variety of ingredients stir-fried together in chilli-laden, tongue-numbing gravy made with herbs and spices – Ma La Xiang Guo is an addictive spicy Sichuan dish that goes perfectly with the chilling-bite of an ice-cold #Coke! 

Show us your most mouth-watering shot of your local favourite and send in your entries now!

Contest ends 26 Oct '16 (6PM), T&Cs apply: http://CokeURL.com/CWF2

#LocalfavouriteWithCoke

22.post_text:
Craving a sumptuous meal of local delicacies lately? Not sure where to go? 

Check out local foodies SethLui.com  and Alvinology  as they rediscover one of Singapore’s most talked about local favourites – Chilli Crab @ Old Airport Road Hawker Centre. 

P.S: Seth will even be sharing how you can TOTALLY savour the rich, spicy flavor of Chilli Crab!

#LocalfavouriteWithCoke

comments.message: Thank you to all who participated in Round 2 of our #LocalfavouriteWithCoke contest! Congratulations to Derrick Chan, your shot of #SushiWithCoke was definitely mouth-watering, and we loved your Singaporean twist to it! Kindly PM us with your contact information so we can get in touch with you. Last chance for everyone to win a feast of up to $500, check out our latest post for more details!

My favourite Sushi Place in Singapore is Ikeikemaru Ryoshi Sushi that is located at Basement 1 at Liang Court; their original store is located at the base of Mt. Fuji and they fly most of their Seafood from Japan (direct)! The experience is indeed as good as having the same meal in Japan herself :) And without a doubt, enjoying #SushiWithCoke (and Singaporean style is one with in cup of filled ice) is the Best combination :)

#ZiCharWithCoke #PumpkinPrawnWithCoke #LocalfavouriteWithCoke whatever the food is, the best pairing will always be the classic #cocacola 
Coke! Fit in all occasion
#BakKutTehWithCoke - An ice-cold Coca Cola and a bowl of piping hot Bak Kut Teh is definitely a combination that will never go out of trend 😋
#thundertearicewithcoke- this combination is like thunder and lightning, they go hand in hand :-)
Looks more like Korean fare then local Singapore fare though. LOL

My favourite trending food of the year is #MalaXiangGuoWithCoke. Is essentially a Sichuan dish that comprises of a variety of ingredients stir-fried together with a chili-laden, tongue-numbing gravy made with herbs and spices. Best pair with a can of #coke to cool your tongue.

#SatayXBlackCarrotCakewithCoke
Take away? Make home dining more fun with ice cold Coca Cola in can! 🍴❤️

#CerealPrawnsWithCoke #LocalfavouriteWithCoke
Shared this with my relatives visiting Singapore!
After the crunch,  sip and 'ah'... or 'lah'!

23.post_text:
Congratulations to the winner for the first round – we loved your shot of local fare with Coke! If you missed it, fret not! 

This week, we’re giving away another chance to win a feast for up to $500 with 5 of your friends. This time it’ll be at Two Chefs Eating Place on 12 Nov '16!

All you have to do is like our Facebook page, share a photo and description of your favourite trending food with Coke pairings in the comments below, and hashtag your picture as such, #<insertfood>WithCoke (e.g. #ArmyStewWithCoke)!

One of our favourite food trends of the year – Budae Jjigae, or more commonly known as Korean Army Stew, is the best comfort meal for a rainy day. Dig into the sizzling pot of flavoursome spicy broth packed with a chockful of ingredients, and balance it out with a can of #IceCold #Coke light. 

We’re only selecting the most mouth-watering shot, so don’t wait and send us your entries now!

Contest ends 18 Oct ‘16 (6PM), T&Cs apply: http://CokeURL.com/CWF2

#LocalfavouriteWithCoke

24.post_text:
Tickle your brain with a puzzle this afternoon to perk up from your afternoon slump! How quickly can you finish the crossword? (Tip: hints below!)

#CocaColaSG #PerkUpWithCoke

###

1. (across) The best way to drink #Coke is when it is _____
1. (down) To motivate and _____ you to get your day going!
2. A glass of #IceCold #Coke keeps you _____ in the hot weather
3. When lagging, #______WithCoke!
4. That feeling you get after enjoying an icy can of #Coke
